attributes.action: STOP THE UK GOVERNMENT PAYING 1 PENNY FOR A BREXIT BILL- WE DON’T OWE ANYTHING
attributes.additional_details: The UK has made in over £500 billion since we joined, the EU has had enough of UK money. This petition demands the UK government must refuse to pay even 1 penny to the EU for Brexit. It is a total betrayal of the UK for the government to give into such EU extortion & give over billions the UK could spend on e.g. schools, roads, NHS, jobs, infrastructure etc. Do not pay
attributes.background: The EU is demanding the UK pay a Brexit bill of up to £60 billion.This is blackmail for the UK to prop up the failing EU.The House of Lords have already confirmed legally the UK doesn't have to pay anything.Also EU law & treaties do NOT have any provisions that mean we have to pay a penny for Brexit
